title: New: Slime – Lean Over
body:
With [Crack in the Road’s festival](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/16141-brainchild-festival-my-panda-shall-fly-kult-country-jacco-gardner-throwing-up-dogfeet-and-drive-confirmed/ "Brainchild Festival: My Panda Shall Fly, KULT COUNTRY, Jacco Gardner, Throwing Up, Dogfeet and Drive confirmed") drawing ever closer, my life is turning into more of a sack full of stress by the day. Thank god then for [Slime](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8997-review-slime-increases/ "Review: Slime – Increases") and his new cut, _Lean Over_**,** a heady and euphoria driven anthem for the summer ahead. It’s undoubtedly his most club focused cut to date, a solid beat forms a backdrop to a pleading vocal sample, all however with an instrumental arrangement that screams **Slime** from the rooftops.

Taken from Increases II, out through **GETME!** in June.

Hit play below.
